name: 英文（一）
comment: 理學院一年級 、光電工程學士學位學程(能力分班)
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Course Description**

This course is designed to support students in their use of English language in academic context. Through intensive and extended reading of text materials and engagement in production activities, students are expected to improve their reading, listening, speaking, and writing abilities.

### Textbook

Daise, D., and C. Norloff. 2015. _Q: Skills for Success: Reading and Writing, 4, 2nd ed._ Oxford University Press.  (Available at 師大書苑; 02-83695556~8;台北市和平東路1段182-3號2樓)

### Grading Policy

**Skit Performance: Going Abroad**    15%

Typed script (5%), performance (5%), peer review (5%)

**Text Assignments:** Handwritten worksheets\*4    16%

**Q&A Recordings**   9%

Students work in pairs. For every chapter discussed in class, each student has to prepare **FIVE** questions to ask his/her partner **ORALLY** and each question must be answered with at least **TWO** complete sentences. **Record the first three chapters’** Q & A and submit them onto moodle. 3 points for each chapter.

**Outside reading** 15% 

**Two Tests**  25%

**Lexile test 10%**

**Attendance and Participation**   10%

**Bonus points:**

If you participate in the English contests held by the university or the Department of English, you can get one bonus point added to your final grade for each contest you participate in. **You may get 3 bonus points at most.**

### Other Requirements

1.  All the assignments must be handed in on time. Late submission is not accepted.
2.  Attendance is required. If you can’t come to a class, you must let me know in advance; otherwise, it will **cost you two points from your final grade**. If you are absent in case of uncontrollable situations (e.g. illness, emergency, etc.), be sure to give me the valid proof within two weeks. Being late for over 30 minutes is treated as absence from the class that day.
3.  **NO make-up tests are possible** unless you are hospitalized or permitted in advance. You can only get 70% of the scores you get in the make-up tests unless you are hospitalized or attend important contests for the university on the day of the test.
4.  Noise from cellular phones is not allowed.
5.  **NO SNACK** is allowed in class.
6.  Grades are **NOT** negotiable.
